    • Constructor Detail

      • HUD

        public HUD(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.viewport.Viewport viewport,
           com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage)
        Simple constructor for the HUD class which initializes all the UI elements and also creates a new Apache Lang Stopwatch.
        Parameters:
        viewport - parent viewport to correctly align the UI elements in the parent screen.
        stage - parent stage to add the UI elements to.

    • Method Detail

      • increaseScore

        public static void increaseScore()
        Increases the score in the HUD by one. Update will be visibile upon the next draw/update.

      • decreaseScore

        public static void decreaseScore()
        Decreases the score in the HUD by one. Update will be visibile upon the next draw/update.

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns the current score displayed by the HUD.
        Returns:
        integer containing the score value.

        Overrides:

        Overrides:

      • startStopwatch

        public void startStopwatch()
        Reset and start the stopwatch in the HUD.

      • stopStopwatch

        public void stopStopwatch()
        Stop the stopwatch in the HUD.

      • getStopWatchTime

        public long getStopWatchTime()
        Get the current time in milliseconds on the stopwatch. The stopwatch will only be reset upon another start. This means even if the game has stopped the last time is still stored.
        Returns:
        long containing the milliseconds on the watch.

      • millisTimeToMinutSecondString

        public java.lang.String millisTimeToMinutSecondString(long millis)
        This method uses the String format and TimeUnit tools to convert milliseconds to minutes, seconds and milliseconds. It then returns a formatted string representing the time.
        Parameters:
        millis: - Current time in milliseconds stored as a long
        Returns:
        String which represents the current time.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
        Overrides:
        dispose in class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
